chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater] and Operating w/ PAC (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater]. The defendant was found guilty of OWI (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater] and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater] was dismissed by the court.

  • Terrell M. Wise was found guilty of OWI (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Terrell M. Wise was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: BOND APPLIED - fine/costs pd in full.
May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not be in taverns or on any premises licensed for the sale of intoxicating beverages, except restaurants or grocery stores.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Submit voluntarily to random tests of blood, breath or urine.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.
*  Ct.1 - Pay fine of $450.00 and court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  Ct.6 - Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.
*  DE is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
Ct.1 - Spend 5 days in the county jail.  Ct.6 - Spend 6 months in the county jail.  Jail to begin forthwith.  Huber privileges allowed.  No electronic leg monitor.  May Not have contact with Faith Caldwell unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.
*  Pay prosecution costs in the amount of $70.00.

timeConds.notes: TO COMMENCE FORTHWITH.  w/Huber privileges.  No electronic leg monitor.  Unless work crew is expressly prohibited by the Court, an inmate serving time as a condition of probation is eligible for work crew and may receive a credit of one day for every 3 days of work performed.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  
*  Pay supervision fees.  
Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Do not be in taverns or on any premises licensed for the sale of intoxicating beverages, except restaurants or grocery stores.  Submit voluntarily to random tests of blood, breath or urine.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by agent.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.  
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges if not already been paid.  
*  Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge unless previously done.    
Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not have contact with Faith C, unless otherwise permitted by the agent.   May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

supervisions.notes: ANY UNPAID COURT OBLIGATIONS ARE STILL TO BE COLLECTED

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Brett Ekes.  Clerk: PT
State is compliant with victim rights and case is resolved.  Counts 1 & 6 - DE pleads Guilty; found guilty by the court.  Counts 2, 3, 4, 5 and 7 - Dismissed and Read in.  Count 8 - Dismissed by the State.  Sentencing arguments made.  

Count 1  -  Sentence is withheld and DE is placed on probation for 2 years concurrent with 13CF788, 14CF1415, 15CF157, and 15CF910 with conditions.  As a condition court imposes 5 days in the KCJ forthwith concurrent.  Huber and Work Crew authorized, but DE is not eligible for the Electronic Leg Monitor.  Parties stipulate to prosecution costs in the amount of $70.00.  See conditions.    Court imposes a fine of $450 plus costs and surcharge.  DE's driving privileges are revoked for 16 months.  AODA Assessment and Ignition Interlock ordered.

Count 6 -  Sentence is withheld and DE is placed on probation for 3 years concurrent with 13CF788, 14CF1415, 15CF157, and 15CF910 with conditions.  As a condition court imposes 6 months in the KCJ forthwith concurrent.  Huber and Work Crew authorized, but DE is not eligible for the Electronic Leg Monitor.  Court costs and surcharges are ordered - See conditions.  

Cash Bond on deposit in 13CF788, 14CF1415, 15CF157 and 15CF748 is to be applied between all files and if any unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  No contact with Faith C. unless permitted by the court or agent.  Appeal Rights, Firearm Warning & Voting Acknowledgement given.
